entry.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
entry.content:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.

entry.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
entry.content:
Off the Beaten Path

Andorra la Vella

Andorra la Vella is the capital of a quirky co-principality lodged in the mountains between Spain and France that offers great skiing, hiking, and lots of duty-free shopping.

entry.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
entry.content:
Featured Travel Topic

San Diego International Airport

The main airport to America's finest city is the busiest single runway airport in the world.

entry.title: Landmark Cars Expands BYD Partnership with New Pune Showroom (Scanx – Corporate Actions)
entry.content:
Top News
Landmark Cars Expands BYD Partnership with New Pune Showroom 30 minutes ago
Landmark Cars, India's leading premium automotive retail network, is expanding its partnership with BYD India Private Limited by opening a new showroom and workshop in Pune, Maharashtra. This move marks Landmark Cars' entry into Pune's premium EV market and strengthens its position as BYD's largest retail partner in India. The expansion comes as BYD experiences an 80% surge in sales this year, establishing itself as a leading player in India's premium EV segment. The new facilities will be established through Watermark Cars Private Limited, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Landmark Cars.

entry.title: Atlantaa Limited Announces Change in Company Secretary Position (Scanx – Corporate Actions)
entry.content:
Atlantaa Limited Announces Change in Company Secretary Position 1 hour ago
Atlantaa Limited has announced changes in its key management personnel. Mr. Prathmesh Pradeep Gaonkar has resigned as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer, effective 06.12.2025, to pursue his own practice. Mrs. Mamta Jain, a qualified Company Secretary with 4 years of post-qualification experience, will succeed him from the same date. Mrs. Jain holds a Post Graduation in Commerce from Ignou University and has experience working with listed and private companies.

entry.title: Investment & Precision Castings Reports Strong Growth Amid GST 2.0 Amendments and Government Orders (Scanx – Corporate Actions)
entry.content:
Investment & Precision Castings Reports Strong Growth Amid GST 2.0 Amendments and Government Orders 1 hour ago
Investment & Precision Casting Ltd (IPCL) has experienced significant business growth due to GST 2.0 amendments and substantial orders from key sectors. The company is operating at 50% capacity utilization, with robust growth in auto and non-auto sectors. IPCL has secured government contracts and expanded into defence and aerospace manufacturing with a new dedicated facility (Plant 3). Profitability is improving due to favorable raw material prices, process optimization, and cost-cutting measures. IPCL expects FY2024-25 to be stronger than the previous year, with significant growth potential across various business segments.

entry.title: Mukka Proteins' Joint Venture Secures ₹474.89 Crore Contract for Innovative Leachate Treatment in Bengaluru (Scanx – Earnings)
entry.content:
Mukka Proteins' Joint Venture Secures ₹474.89 Crore Contract for Innovative Leachate Treatment in Bengaluru 55 minutes ago
Mukka Proteins Limited, known for fish product manufacturing, has entered the environmental solutions sector through a joint venture. The company secured a ₹474.89 crore contract from Bengaluru Solid Waste Management Limited for treating legacy leachate at Mittaganahalli and Kannur landfill sites. The four-year project, with Mukka holding a 76% stake in the JV, involves an estimated CAPEX of ₹100 crore and a six-month construction timeline. This strategic diversification aims to address environmental challenges, ensure zero untreated discharge, and potentially open new opportunities in environmental conservation efforts.

entry.content:

Atlantaa Limited has announced changes in its key management personnel. Mr. Prathmesh Pradeep Gaonkar has resigned as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer, effective 06.12.2025, to pursue his own practice. Mrs. Mamta Jain, a qualified Company Secretary with 4 years of post-qualification experience, will succeed him from the same date. Mrs. Jain holds a Post Graduation in Commerce from Ignou University and has experience working with listed and private companies.

entry.title: Landmark Cars Expands BYD Partnership with New Pune Showroom (Scanx – Orders & Deals)
entry.content:
Landmark Cars Expands BYD Partnership with New Pune Showroom 30 minutes ago
Landmark Cars, India's leading premium automotive retail network, is expanding its partnership with BYD India Private Limited by opening a new showroom and workshop in Pune, Maharashtra. This move marks Landmark Cars' entry into Pune's premium EV market and strengthens its position as BYD's largest retail partner in India. The expansion comes as BYD experiences an 80% surge in sales this year, establishing itself as a leading player in India's premium EV segment. The new facilities will be established through Watermark Cars Private Limited, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Landmark Cars.

entry.content:
ICICI Prudential AMC Announces IPO Price Band, Signaling Strong Market Position 1 hour ago
ICICI Prudential Asset Management Company has set the price band for its initial public offering at ₹2,061 to ₹2,165 per equity share, with a minimum bid lot of 6 shares. The company's financial data shows growth, with total assets increasing by 5.22% to ₹308,847.00 crore and investments growing by 4.92% to ₹304,054.00 crore over the past year. The IPO is expected to attract significant investor interest due to the company's strong market position in India's asset management industry.

entry.title: Mukka Proteins' Joint Venture Secures ₹474.89 Crore Contract for Innovative Leachate Treatment in Bengaluru (Scanx – Global)
entry.content:
Mukka Proteins' Joint Venture Secures ₹474.89 Crore Contract for Innovative Leachate Treatment in Bengaluru 55 minutes ago
Mukka Proteins Limited, known for fish product manufacturing, has entered the environmental solutions sector through a joint venture. The company secured a ₹474.89 crore contract from Bengaluru Solid Waste Management Limited for treating legacy leachate at Mittaganahalli and Kannur landfill sites. The four-year project, with Mukka holding a 76% stake in the JV, involves an estimated CAPEX of ₹100 crore and a six-month construction timeline. This strategic diversification aims to address environmental challenges, ensure zero untreated discharge, and potentially open new opportunities in environmental conservation efforts.

entry.title: Investment & Precision Castings Reports Strong Growth Amid GST 2.0 Amendments and Government Orders (Scanx – Markets)
entry.content:
Investment & Precision Castings Reports Strong Growth Amid GST 2.0 Amendments and Government Orders 1 hour ago
Investment & Precision Casting Ltd (IPCL) has experienced significant business growth due to GST 2.0 amendments and substantial orders from key sectors. The company is operating at 50% capacity utilization, with robust growth in auto and non-auto sectors. IPCL has secured government contracts and expanded into defence and aerospace manufacturing with a new dedicated facility (Plant 3). Profitability is improving due to favorable raw material prices, process optimization, and cost-cutting measures. IPCL expects FY2024-25 to be stronger than the previous year, with significant growth potential across various business segments.

ICICI Prudential AMC Announces IPO Price Band, Signaling Strong Market Position 1 hour ago
ICICI Prudential Asset Management Company has set the price band for its initial public offering at ₹2,061 to ₹2,165 per equity share, with a minimum bid lot of 6 shares. The company's financial data shows growth, with total assets increasing by 5.22% to ₹308,847.00 crore and investments growing by 4.92% to ₹304,054.00 crore over the past year. The IPO is expected to attract significant investor interest due to the company's strong market position in India's asset management industry.

entry.content: Sector Performance Snapshot: Banking, Finance, and IT Lead Gains Amid Mixed Market Sentiment

entry.title: undefined (MarketsMojo – Stock Market News)
entry.content: The Indian equity market displayed a broadly positive tone on 5 December 2025, with 27 sectors advancing against 9 declining, resulting in a sector advance-decline ratio of 3.0. The BSE 500 index recorded a one-day return of 0.39%, reflecting cautious optimism among investors. Notably, the NIFTYPSUBANK, NIFTYFINANCE, and NIFTYIT sectors emerged as the top gainers, buoyed by strong performances from key stocks such as SBI, Cholaman Investment & Finance, and HCL Technologies. Conversely, sectors like NIFTYMEDIA, BSE Capital Goods, and S&P Industrials faced downward pressure, influenced by significant declines in select heavyweight stocks.

entry.content: Jagatjit Industries Q2 FY26: Mounting Losses and Deteriorating Operations Signal Deep Distress

entry.title: undefined (MarketsMojo – Result Analysis)
entry.content: Jagatjit Industries Ltd., the Kapurthala-based beverages manufacturer, reported a catastrophic second quarter for FY2026, with consolidated net losses ballooning to ₹27.91 crores—a staggering 249.75% deterioration year-on-year. The micro-cap company, valued at ₹789.00 crores, saw its stock trading at ₹165.00 as of December 5, down 34.78% over the past year and significantly underperforming the Sensex. The results reveal a company in acute operational distress, with negative operating margins, collapsing revenues, and mounting interest burdens that raise serious questions about financial viability.
